Main

John Zobolas {#title}
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Research software engineer with a passion for making reproducible data analyses 
and for writing clean & tested code. 
My research interests include modeling of cancer cell systems, predicting 
synergistic drug combinations for cancer and understaning the mechanisms that 
drive combinatorial treatment.
